categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Dogah was a male Imperial Grappler Captain active during the Third Galactic War. In 3626 BBY, he, with fellow Imperials Ziliss and Kodo, fought the Commander, Arn Peralun, and Aryn Leneer when they arrived at the Dantooine Jedi Enclave to investigate the whereabouts of Darth Malgus. Dogah, however, perished in the encounter along with his Imperial companions.

Dogah appears as a boss in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Onslaught expansion. He is only seen in the Republic plotline, given that his role is replaced by grappler Osonu in the Imperial plotline.
